name: That blurry place - chapter 1: the boat
name_original: That blurry place - chapter 1: the boat
description:
What happened? Is it a bad dream?

You're in a mysterious blurry place. Escape and go back home in this short atmospheric and artsy point and click game.

This game is chapter 1. The plot is quite simple, we plan a more complex one in the next chapter. In this first chapter, our intention was to set up the first contact and reflexions about a mysterious place with strange, vague and intriguing shapes and appearances. Get a sense of where the atmosphere is taking us. 

A walkthrough can be found here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JATNnoyScr4

Made by KiwiRosa (now BlueTvWaves) and shadowycycledev.

This game was initially released in July 2019 on game portals. This is a slightly updated version (things and characters you can interact with are now highlighted and there are some minor improvements).

We've finally started working on the second chapter!
